General.Name: Baolingbao Biology Co Ltd
General.Description: Baolingbao Biology Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells a range of functional sugars in China and internationally. The company offers prebiotics, such as isomaltooligosaccharide, galactooligosaccharides, fructooligosaccharides, and bagasse trisaccharide products; sugar alcohols and new sugar source products, including erythritol, trehalose, crystalline fructose, alodonose, and maltose; dietary fiber products, such as polydextrose and resistant dextrin; modified, waxy maize, and corn starch products; oligomaltose, fructose syrup, and corn syrup solid products; and animal nutrition products comprising baolekang and fubaokang. Its products are used in various applications, such as dairy, drinks, snacks, health products and dietary supplements, candy, special food items, chemicals for daily use, and animal nutrition. The company also exports its products to approximately 100 countries. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Yucheng, China.

4.Name: Mr. Guogang  Zhang
